benefits.title: Remote-first
benefits.description: Work from anywhere in the world. We believe great talent isn't limited by geography. Async-friendly culture with flexible hours across all time zones.

benefits.title: Equity
benefits.description: Competitive equity packages for all team members. Share in the success you help create as we build the future of agent infrastructure.

benefits.title: Learning Budget
benefits.description: $3,000 annual learning and development budget. Invest in courses, books, conferences, and tools that help you grow professionally.

benefits.title: Flexible Hours
benefits.description: No fixed schedules or rigid hours. Work when you're most productive. We care about results, not when you're online.

benefits.title: Health & Wellness
benefits.description: Comprehensive health insurance and wellness stipend. Take care of your physical and mental health with our support.

benefits.title: Agent Stipend
benefits.description: $200/month to experiment with AI tools and agents. Build with the latest AI technologies and stay at the cutting edge.

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.description: We're a small, passionate team building tools that empower developers to create the next generation of AI agents. We value autonomy, transparency, and impact.

values.title: Builders First
values.description: We exist to serve developers. Every decision we make prioritizes the builder experience and community needs.

values.title: Move Fast, Think Deep
values.description: Ship quickly, but think carefully. We balance speed with thoughtful design and long-term architectural decisions.

values.title: Radically Open
values.description: Default to transparency. Share our work, our thinking, and our learnings openly with the community.

values.title: Human + AI
values.description: We build tools that enhance human capabilities, not replace them. AI should empower people to do their best work.
